Subject: Off to battle
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Cleder/Rixer/Forrior/Blyer/Firearm/Hot Rod::

"Ok, Commander." Cleder made his way to Hot Rod's position.
"Hot Rod, I'm coming with you. The others are on their way."

Just then Rixer, Forrior, Blyer,and Firearm came in.

Cleder turned to them.
"Iron Raptor has given me command of this mission. We are to help defend
the Chiviton base. Now transform, and head out."

They all did so except Hot Rod. e had thought he would have command of
this mission. But got on task. Ther Chivitons needed his help.
He transformed and followed the others towards the Chiviton base.
